tasks.objective: [cleanup] Update test files vocabulary - replace 'raid' with 'session' in test data (helpers.ts, persistence.test.ts, dual-logger.test.ts, cli.test.ts)
[cleanup] Remove dead code - enhanced-metrics.ts (no imports), knowledge-tracker.ts (unused), src/examples/ (dead demos)

[critical] Fix worktree dependency installation - run 'pnpm install' in worktrees before verification so tests can run. Currently worktrees have no node_modules and verification fails with 'vitest not found'
[dashboard] Fix watch dashboard - burn rate graph not updating, cache hit graph not updating, tasks pane not refreshing dynamically, SDK metrics showing 0 tokens/burn

[critical] Prevent agents from pushing during task execution - agents should only commit locally, orchestrator controls all pushes after verification passes. Currently agents can bypass verification by pushing directly via Bash

[review] Fix review pass logic - opus gets only 2 passes then 'escalates' to nothing, 'converged' is misleading when issues still found. Opus should get more attempts as final tier, messaging should be accurate

[output] Improve terminal streaming output - JSON format should be default (for agent consumption), add --human flag for human-readable output. Current streaming is noisy and not optimized for either use case
[cleanup] Remove local LLM experiment - local-llm.ts, diff-experiment-runner.ts, experiments/diff-generator.ts, and CLI quick-ollama-test command
[cleanup] Remove orphaned experiments framework - src/experiments/ directory (A/B framework not wired to anything)
[docs] Rewrite README.md for agent consumption - remove prose/marketing, use tables and key-value structure, explicit command→behavior mappings
[docs] Rewrite ARCHITECTURE.md for agent consumption - file→function→behavior mappings, decision trees for when to use what, no redundancy
[docs] Create API.md - every exported function with signature, params, return type, error conditions, example usage
[docs] Create DECISIONS.md - when to use solo vs grind, when to escalate, which model for which task type, routing logic explained
[feedback] Create metrics reader - load metrics.jsonl, parse outcomes, compute success rates by model/complexity
[feedback] Wire metrics to routing - adjust complexity thresholds based on historical success rates per model tier
[feedback] Add 'undercity introspect' command - analyze own metrics, identify improvement opportunities, generate tasks
[feedback] Wire experiment framework to grind - randomly assign tasks to variants, track which routing/prompts work better
[feedback] Learn task patterns - cluster similar tasks by objective keywords, track which patterns succeed at which tiers
[context] Build AST indexer - parse TypeScript files, extract function/class/type definitions, store in queryable format for fast lookup
[context] Build dependency graph - map imports/exports between files, identify which files are affected by changes to a given file
[context] Pre-compute file summaries - for each file, generate a 1-2 line description of purpose/exports, cache for fast context loading
[context] Smart context selection - given a task, automatically identify which files/functions are relevant using AST + dependency graph
[metrics] Track success rate per complexity level - which tasks need escalation most?
[grind] Improve grind command - better task selection, skip already-complete, priority ordering
[integration] Conflict detection - if two workers touch same files, flag before merge attempt
[grind] Improve verification retry logic - allow multiple fix attempts at same tier before escalating
[learning] Evaluate DSPy for prompt optimization - assess if prompt quality is the bottleneck vs routing/model selection
[continuous] Sync task board with grind - mark tasks complete when merged, update status during execution
[verify] Make spell check non-blocking - spell failures should warn but not fail verification
[onboard] Create 'undercity init' command - interactive/auto-detecting setup for new projects, creates .undercity/ structure
[onboard] Auto-detect project tooling - scan package.json/configs for package manager, test runner, linter, build system
[onboard] Abstract verification loop - replace hardcoded 'pnpm check && pnpm build && pnpm test' with configurable project-specific commands
[onboard] Scout-generated rules - use scout agent to analyze codebase and generate .claude/rules/ with architecture, patterns, conventions
[onboard] Create project profile system - .undercity/profile.json storing learned patterns, failure modes, optimal thresholds per project
[onboard] Self-tuning after tasks - analyze verification failures, adjust complexity routing, update project profile automatically
[portable] Make undercity installable as npm package - 'npx undercity init' or 'pnpm add -D undercity' workflow
[agent-opt] Rewrite oracle cards for agent utility - replace poetic lore with concrete examples, action patterns, or decision heuristics that actually help agents
[agent-opt] Audit all agent prompts (squad definitions) - optimize for task completion, remove fluff, add concrete behavioral guidelines
